text.author: P. Scott Corbett, Volker Janssen, John M. Lund, Todd Pfannestiel, Sylvie Waskiewicz, Paul Vickery
text.title: U.S. History
text.summary: This excerpt from a history book tells about the American Civil War, describing economic hardships for the Confederacy, its failure to obtain support from Great Britain and France, and the role of African American Union soldiers in the war.
